22-017HR.summary: Recommendation to approve minutes for the Equity and Human Relations Commission Regular Meeting of Wednesday, June 1, 2022.Page 1 of 7TELECONFERENCE, 6:00 PMWEDNESDAY, AUGUST 3, 2022CITY OF LONG BEACHEQUITY AND HUMAN RELATIONS COMMISSION MINUTESA motion was made by Commissioner Allen, seconded by Commissioner Camacho, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 7 - Cory Allen, Robbie Butler, Trace Camacho, Lissette Flores, Zuleimy Gonzalez, Zoe Nicholson and Amy EriksenAbstain: 2 - Jon Schultz and Chanel SmithExcused: 2 - Christopher Covington and Alyssa GutierrezPUBLIC COMMENTNo members of the public addressed the Commission.CHAIR REMARKSVice Chair Eriksen provided opening remarks.OFFICE OF EQUITY REMARKSAlanah Grant, Office of Equity, presented the staff report.Teresa Chandler, Deputy City Manager, spoke.COMMISSIONER UPDATESVice Chair Eriksen spoke.Commissioner Allen spoke.Commissioner Nicholson spoke.Commissioner Schultz spoke.Vice Chair Eriksen spoke.NEW BUSINESSPage 2 of 7TELECONFERENCE, 6:00 PMWEDNESDAY, AUGUST 3, 2022CITY OF LONG BEACHEQUITY AND HUMAN RELATIONS COMMISSION MINUTES2.

22-018HR.summary: Recommendation to receive and file a presentation from Just Futures Law on Community Oversight Commissions for Surveillance Technology.Julie Mao, Just Futures Law, spoke.Gaby Segovia spoke.Caitlin Bellis spoke.Jamilet Ochoa spoke.Joshua de Leon spoke.Maria Contreras spoke.Silvia Alonzo spoke.Joana Diaz spoke.Dave Shukla spoke.Vice Chair Ericksen spoke.Commissioner Gonzalez spoke.Commissioner Allen spoke.Alanah Grant, Office of Equity, spoke.Vice Chair Eriksen spoke.Commissioner Allen spoke.A dialogue ensued between Vice Chair Eriksen and Commissioner Allen.Commissioner Smith spoke.Page 3 of 7TELECONFERENCE, 6:00 PMWEDNESDAY, AUGUST 3, 2022CITY OF LONG BEACHEQUITY AND HUMAN RELATIONS COMMISSION MINUTESAlanah Grant, Office of Equity, spoke.Vice Chair Ericksen spoke.Commissioner Nicholson spoke.A dialogue ensued between Vice Chair Eriksen and Commissioner Nicholson.Alanah Grant, Office of Equity, spoke.Vice Chair Eriksen spoke.Commissioner Nicholson spoke.A dialogue ensued between Vice Chair Eriksen and Commissioner Nicholson.Commissioner Allen spoke.Commissioner Butler spoke.Vice Chair Eriksen spoke.A dialogue ensued between Vice Chair Eriksen and Commissioner Butler.Commissioner Nicholson spoke.Alanah Grant, Office of Equity, spoke.Teresa Chandler, Deputy City Manager, spoke.Commissioner Gonzalez spoke.Vice Chair Eriksen spoke.Alanah Grant, Office of Equity, spoke.Jeny Gonzales spoke.Page 4 of 7TELECONFERENCE, 6:00 PMWEDNESDAY, AUGUST 3, 2022CITY OF LONG BEACHEQUITY AND HUMAN RELATIONS COMMISSION MINUTESA motion was made by Commissioner Allen, seconded by Commissioner Gonzalez, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 9 - Cory Allen, Robbie Butler, Trace Camacho, Lissette Flores, Zuleimy Gonzalez, Zoe Nicholson, Jon Schultz, Chanel Smith and Amy EriksenExcused: 2 - Christopher Covington and Alyssa Gutierrez3.
